name: iuneq2i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2))

stmt.origin: mprg(s0, c0, wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Equality inference for indexed union. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2003.)
